## Node2D.toHiccup() method

By implementing this method (`IToHiccup` interface), scene graph nodes can be directly used by hdom-canvas and/or hiccup-svg (for the latter one needs to call `convertTree()` first).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toHiccup(): any[] | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`any[] | undefined`
